meanings.definition: To fill with dismay or horror
meanings.sent2: The news of the accident appals the community.
meanings.sent3: The haunted house appals visitors every Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm appals the young children.
meanings.sent5: The ghost story appals the campers around the fire.

meanings.definition: To cause intense shock or disgust
meanings.sent1: The rotten smell appals my senses.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled food appals the chef in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The gruesome scene appals the witnesses.
meanings.sent5: The disturbing painting appals art enthusiasts.
